line_1: While healths gae round to him wha, tight,
line_2: When skirlin weanies see the light,

line_1: While healths gae round to him wha, tight,
line_2: Thou maks the gossips clatter bright,

line_1: While healths gae round to him wha, tight,
line_2: How fumbling coofs their dearies slight,

line_1: But still in vain, the frame was tight
line_2: And only pervious to the light.

line_1: Yet the auld gudewife and her mays sae tight,
line_2: For a chap at the door in braid day-light,

line_1: But the auld gudewife and her mays sae tight
line_2: For a wooer that comes in braid day light,

line_1: Yet stretching out his words sae tight,
Confine these culprits (holding up his hands) bind'em tight,
line_2: Nor Girls can scratch nor Fools can write.

line_1: Below the fatt'rels, snug and tight,
line_2: Now haud you there, ye're out o' sight,

line_1: Below the fatt'rels, snug and tight,
line_2: Na faith ye yet! ye'll no be right,

line_1: Below the fatt'rels, snug and tight,
There's some sark-necks I wad draw tight,
line_2: Alas! I'm but a nameless wight,

line_1: There's some sark-necks I wad draw tight,
line_2: Trode i' the mire out o' sight!

line_1: There's some sark-necks I wad draw tight,
line_2: But could I like MONTGOMERIES fight,
